Reviews.Content: stay visiting daughter staff always treats welcomed friend room bright cheerful really could use carpet replace air conditioning excellent beds comfortable view city easy walk restaurants night life middle center 3 blocks away im sure id like walk back alone night taxis easy get 15 min 25 airport

Reviews.Title: “I would like to stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: LakersFan
Reviews.Content: wedding two different experiences catering team exceptional 100 happy wedding reception however experience families experience staying hotel different story really people front desk incredibly rude every parents family members treated horribly room service disgusting experience bad decided stay another jw marriott planned stay honeymoon regret suggesting wedding guests stay never stay jw marriott

Reviews.Title: “Great room, fantastic service”
Reviews.Author: amoljo
Reviews.Content: state hotel post cruise one night fabulous cruise around royal unfortunately travel picked us recommendation say tried change luck spoiled holiday arrived surprisingly early whole day ahead us first receptionist couldnt help telling us time collected next day airport said room record us went room drop put luggage came back tried different receptionist also didnt know asked ring transport company us gave number told gave asked concierge lady best visit nearby asked shopping nowhere without travel less 50 didnt seem interested helping really set toward sea heard bayside thought couldnt far 20 min walk lovely pleasant day couldnt tell us got back didnt either easy use free got tried reception luck rang gave room cruises tried help get free slow internet room found rang hotel staff useless interest business clients pool bar would pleasant use end day shut went got lots took children conference next day room gave us 2 adults 13 11 yr old boy girl 2 double beds like 2 three quarter beds small tv mirror want family holiday cruise hotel dont choose one

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay at the JW Marriott”
Reviews.Author: KimCT
Reviews.Content: rooms comfortable wellequipped excellent wifi good business location

Reviews.Title: “Usual high standard”
Reviews.Author: Jctee
Reviews.Content: stayed meeting last week worst experience ever large party 150 people meeting service awful meeting executive never showed two days hotel meeting staff rude even broke one reason started something see kind service marriott food ok enough serve exact lunch buffet twice week two days also expecting package delivered hotel got huge mess couldnt even find mine turned stored even overall bad experience business meeting stay due poor service

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Experience”
Reviews.Author: Intrepid1
Reviews.Content: food restaurant horrible unless like eggs eggs took 20 minutes get toast another 10 butter arrive unbelievable hotel 3 awful breakfasts enough front desk staff unpleasant obviously happy greet serve customers pool nice except couple jacuzzi 9 pm nasty child could seen security guard didnt appear care

Reviews.Title: “Usual 5 star treatment from Marriott”
Reviews.Author: michiruo
Reviews.Content: service impeccable hotel incredibly clean location safe nice particularly residential middle every bank corporate offices really problem especially car lovely balcony room bit biscayne bay view tv mirror bathroom top im sure people love

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: RMacari
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel recent day weekend first choice would stay miami beach using marriott points able property downtown location would better suited business travelers leisure travelers heart downtown several good restaurants within walking distance 25 cab ride closest beach south beach 600 block drive beach awesome hotel pool 7th floor roof deck gets sun limited hours day surrounding high rooms need update look little tired see difference jw marriott marriott hotels stayed past ask room end units two exterior walls 3rd wall quiet noise neighbors also spa street must

Reviews.Title: “Great Deal, Great Service, All-around Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: Navy_Lady
Reviews.Content: first nice hotel clean new nice furnishings fixtures fitness center smallish wellequipped perfectly 6 people working bed heaven comfortable things wish knew went provide lousy hair dryer know type takes 45 minutes dry hair valet parking 29 day expensive slow rude downtown miami location quiet weekend starbucks excited go downstairs closed weekend however cute french bakery across street tasty coffee clearly business hotel said car close anywhere want 1 mile south america airlines arena area also nice views key biscayne

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, Great Staff, Handy Location”
Reviews.Author: timjarrett
Reviews.Content: friends went miami new years wanted near miami beach away south beach traffic stayed hotel service wonderful staff showed hospitality rooms comfortable clean would go back second

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Business Downtown Location”
Reviews.Author: Mroth
Reviews.Content: wife went staff cars friendly lady checkin friendly recommended great restaurant walking distance thoroughly enjoyed great suite truly worth liked fact entered room put beautiful soft music us closet needs bit also enjoyed watching tv inside original also computer room nice plus unfortunately going send someone never showed even though followed phone switched since really werent going use couple minutes nice extras rooms

Reviews.Title: “First class”
Reviews.Author: JW37
Reviews.Content: place stay miami great big bedroom pools restaurants kids play areas freindly staff slight issue first room shown soon lots smiles round

Reviews.Title: “First Class”
Reviews.Author: Sicall
Reviews.Content: although hotel nice business style hotel usual quality jw marriott arrived 11 front desk kind enough give us keys room got room discovered odor called front desk sent bellman room bellman shocked horrible odor called front desk saying definitely necessary us move front desk said didnt another room type wanted pay 50 could concierge room conversation front desk finally asked talk manager manager said policy give people concierge rooms without 50 stood ground told shocked even though smell asked us pay different room told manager customer service somehow found another room right away although manager never apologized smell take time deal issue arrived room discovered given us executive suite clear suite wasnt used much shampoo amenities room track housekeeping ask shampoo nonetheless grateful room rated customer service low even though get nicer room would preferred nice customer service rest hotel pretty average definitely usual jw marriott quality

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: vlartan
Reviews.Content: go wrong hotel prime downtown location solid professional staff booked new jw open time got placed level food great surprisingly inexpensive high end hotel tv bathroom mirror must see prompt service valet service 32 day check get chance overall nice stay would definately go back

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: MI_Jayhawk
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel october 9 12th ive read earlier reviews described service experience nothing like appreciate every staff member dealt exceptionally pleasant person checked us housekeeping staff valet experience folks miami somewhat didnt experience staff helpful arranging room sunday morning rooms tastefully decorated photos previous reviewers accomodations upon checkin given corner room 19th floor really enjoyed room wasnt huge comfortable quiet hotel located financial center miami consequently id say caters business clientele shouldnt feel place numerous dinning options within walking distance depending comfort level chain la brickell village within walking distance offers nightlife road bar miami isnt far youre looking south beach wont find neighborhood quiet evenings fitness room average parking costs comparable hotels area

Reviews.Title: “Great pre-cruise short stay”
Reviews.Author: UpperClassChick
Reviews.Content: reasonable location downtown near lots good restaurants hotel well kept provides pretty good facilities bit dated places still clean nothing extraordinary report time nothing bad say either

Reviews.Title: “Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: BlueDart404
Reviews.Content: super nice hotel pool beautiful rooms extremely comfortable bathrooms luxurious restaurant service good complaint husband went swimming pool around 530 pm wanted use one set pool area state left food looked like setting long time previous guests including fried bit turn place great

Reviews.Title: “Great Business Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MimiCSeattle
Reviews.Content: tend stay luxury hotels really enjoyed hotel 1 night quiet floor pool large weight room acceptable free wifi free business lounge printer key 40 really nice stay whenever early meeting brickell avenue nicely appointed room public spaces extremely helpful front desk concierge valet efficient even 29 overnight

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Away From South Beach”
Reviews.Author: mangopa
Reviews.Content: great hotel great service cheap either visited hotel december 2009 stayed 2 nights elegant business hotel good food location best downtown miami nicest place tourist much see 7pm looking great business hotel business center downtown price issue found place

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away”
Reviews.Author: nycosmopolitan
Reviews.Content: husband stayed jw marriott 4 days great time room clean staff excellent hotel amenities wonderful go wrong choosing hotel plans stay later year excellent hotel

Reviews.Title: “Classy Hotel”
Reviews.Author: papaspoo
Reviews.Content: stayed one night fortunate get corner room water view room view didnt meals enough time try facilities general review based primarily one night room bed comfortable linens excellent complaints relatively minor hotel level one marriott member requested foam pillows didnt get wireless though free time hotels quit travelers wireless took half hour get thing work alone took colleague even longer doesnt seem limited computer room coffee lousy cant offer real coffee overall location needs fine nice lunch next door got coffee morning starbucks id happy stay coming business nearby probably wouldnt stay tourist

Reviews.Title: “A solid 4-star hotel”
Reviews.Author: aerofl
Reviews.Content: wife conference hotel along 2 year old room nice clean staff nice really option use valet parking since parking anywhere around hotel

Reviews.Title: “This Hotel Is Numero Uno”
Reviews.Author: TERRIERSRULE
Reviews.Content: visit miami mainly south beach least year time decided stay away beach could enjoy downtown miami little jw marriott perfect seems district fine us nice quiet night first arrived hotel pleased saw however one helped us bags pulled quite surprise lobby hotel nicely decorated front desk staff inviting room perfect loved bathroom flat screen computer free internet access pool spa fitness center great complaint really bad place us store water beverages refrigerator set like vending machine room put anything else get go restaurants hotel wanted explore city front desk staff referred us local restaurant called versailles wonderful thought would stuffy fancy place quite opposite food great thereâ€™s also right across street hotel good quick meal overall stay marriott great back

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel no flaws”
Reviews.Author: nimrodwetman
Reviews.Content: nights miami cruise whilst overly impressed miami hotel lovely clean air conditioned big rooms great bathroom big bath internet access huge tv everything need plenty people reception willing point us right direction trips food shops etc tip course unfortunately fairly built area couldnt see sea room although understand rooms sea views bit walk nearest shops etc taxis easy come always rail 10 minute walk nearest station overall nice place stay

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: sampagirl
Reviews.Content: sister booked room wife jw marriott miami stay 2 nights start end honeymoon called find reservations system found reservation spoke reservation staff ended hung morning found billed credit card room think perhaps staff needs training least attitude stayed several jw well always positive experience im sure would top 3 choices stay dissapointed staff one

Reviews.Title: “This was my home for 8 months”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed jw 9 days thanksgiving pleased choice want beach might best hotel stay downtown area planning rent car drive around south florida great played game got awesome rate per night didnt stop hotel form upgrading us concierge level corner room checkin bit slow arrived late night room furnished modern bed perfect everything clean modern tv kind old working another highlight concierge lounge top floor featured good selection hot cold snacks evening well nice breakfast selection hotel lounge even open thanksgiving evening weekend gave us free breakfast vouchers hotel restaurant overall loved hotel staff definitely return hotel future

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: EvaLouise
Reviews.Content: stayed marriott two nights cruise march 21 2010 hotel beautiful clean staff extremely friendly helpful everyone always smile always quick offer help suggestions go get room floor pool private little area right outside patio doors wonderful would highly recommend however must know hotel purely business area alot around able walk bayside market ten minutes loved

Reviews.Title: “JW - Good Deal”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: first good great location brickell avenue want area miami nearby hotels include fabulous four seasons conrad miami front desk staff pleasant efficient beds comfortable combination items make w marriott worth rate stains bedroom carpet bathroom throw limited cable tv selection channels etc newspapers turndown even though listed guest services bathrobes speed phone room service left corridor night one housekeeping seems speak even english main restaurant closed monday night isnt monday business travel day breakfast buffet ripoff la carte oatmeal served tiny bowl size coffee cup literally check bar even though customers room many good hotels miami would return one half price
